#summary is_tautology(F)
is_tautology(F)
<pre>
inputs: F is a formula.
return: whether F is a tautology(F)or not.
</pre>
| `let x`,,1,,`, ..., x`,,n,,` be the free variables in F`<br>
| `return whether `[RewriterSimplify R_simplify]`(`[RewriterQuantifierElimination R_quantifier_elimination]`( for all x`,,1,,` : ... for all x`,,n,,` : F )) is "True"`<br>
